Uses of Interface
interfaces.EngineComponent

Packages that use EngineComponent 
Package Description
effects  
entity  
entity.ghost  
entity.pickup  
main  
ui  

  • Uses of EngineComponent in effects

    Classes in effects that implement EngineComponent 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Effect
    The Effect class is responsible for animating effects inside the game window
    class  TextFadeEffect
    This Effect class is used to show a piece of text, and have it slowly fade out and rise out of position

  • Uses of EngineComponent in entity

    Classes in entity that implement EngineComponent 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Entity  
    class  PacmanEntity
    The PacmanEntity handles the drawing, animations, collisions, pickups, etc of the player/pacman.

  • Uses of EngineComponent in entity.ghost

    Classes in entity.ghost that implement EngineComponent 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  DirectGhostEntity
    The DirectGhostEntity is a ghost that directly follows the Pacman as efficiently as possible - It attempts to find the shortest path to the player.
    class  FlankGhostEntity
    The FlankGhostEntity is a ghost that attempts to cut off Pacman - It attempts to path find efficiently to a location infront of the pacman.
    class  GhostEntity
    The abstract GhostEntity class is used to store the pathfinding logic used by the various different ghosts.
    class  SpeedFlankGhostEntity
    The SpeedFlankGhostEntity is functions exactly the same as the FlankGhostEntity, however this ghost has the same movement speed as the player, proving to be a very difficult opponent indeed.

  • Uses of EngineComponent in entity.pickup

    Classes in entity.pickup that implement EngineComponent 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  FruitPointPickup
    The FruitPointPickup exists on the map and when picked up by pacman, will provide the player with points, and increase the players extra lives if any are missing (max.
    class  LargePointPickup
    The same as a normal PointPickup, but gives the user additional points and appears on the map as a larger dot.
    class  Pickup
    The Pickup class handles some of the backend core functionality of on-screen Pickups
    class  PointPickup
    The PointPickup exists on the map and when picked up by pacman, will provide the player with points, and play a sound effect.

  • Uses of EngineComponent in main

    Classes in main that implement EngineComponent 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CoreEngine
    This class is the underlying engine that drives the game; it is used to draw information from the game's state to the JFrame associated.
    class  PacmanGame
    Base class for this pacman game; instantiates all core controllers, game engine, entity sprites and runs the main render loop.

  • Uses of EngineComponent in ui

    Classes in ui that implement EngineComponent 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Button
    The Button Component allows the user to interact with a visual element via mouse movement and clicks
    class  ColouredComponent
    A coloured version of the Component class, providing storage, setting and getting of the colour used for this component
    class  Component
    The core component class, used to abstract common information from UI elements, such as position and size.
    class  Label
    The Label class is used to display a single line of text on the game screen
    class  Panel
    The Panel class is used to display a solid, rectangular block of colour; or, the outline of said block.
